She looks over her body, seeing her massive belly, her large butt, her really thick legs, and her very pudgy face. "This is..."

As Cera sat on her rear she stammered out"Little foot ! Please don't make fun of me like this! It's not what..." but then stopped talking as littlefoot's "bigfoot" began t emerge from his arousal, and as she stared at it, Littlefoot noticed where she was staring and then became ashamed. "I'm sorry Cera! It's just growing on it's own and ..well..." The long necked dinosaur knew what was coming next; and braced for the anger from the 3-horned female but instead heard," Well it looks like I'm not the only big thing in this spot and want you to do something for me." "Realived that she wasn't going to scream harsh words at him, littlefoot replyed to Cera, "Sure thing what do you want me to do?" Then Cera replyed...
125131.title: Great, I kinda like it

1253.content: A weight gain story about Ducky?
1253.title: Next choice.

125311.content:
Ducky was walking down the woods when she spotted something glimmering in a treetop. It was a fruit that with its bight orange colour shinned like a diamond when the sunlight hit it.

As soon as Ducky´s eyes got sight on it she couldn’t drag her eyes from it. Her original reasons for why she was walking though these parts of the valley didn’t matter any more. All she could think of was to get that fruit. “Oh, I would like to get that fruit. Yep, yep, yep.” Ducky thought.

Now the only dilemma for her was if she was going to go and get her friends to help her get the fruit, or if she was going to try and get the fruit right now by herself.

What was it going to be?
125311.title: Story 1

1253112.content:
Ducky thought about getting her friends to help her, but a crying for food from her little belly changed her mind. “I know I was hungry, but not this hungry.” Ducky thought. “I must have something to eat now!”

Looking up she saw that the fruit wasn’t sitting so high up in the tree. (It actually sat just 10 feet up, but it was much for Ducky because she was only one foot tall. The tree was also very thick, making it impossible for Ducky to climb it.)

“If I throw a small rock at the shaft the fruit would just fall down to me.” Ducky thought.

And Ducky did just that. She took some small rock and tried to hit the shaft of the fruit. After some tries Ducky finally hit it with one of the rocks, but the fruit didn’t fall down. “Maybe I need to hit it some more.

After a couple of more hits Ducky could hear how the shaft was starting to snap. She made herself ready to catch the fruit when it started to fall. At first she was going to catch it with her hands but then she thought, “It doesn’t look so big. I can probably catch it with my mouth.”

So when the shaft finally snapped and the fruit started to fall Ducky took and made her gap big. To late Ducky saw a flaw in her plan, the size of the fruit.

Ducky hadn’t thought about how perspective works. The reason for why the fruit had been so small before was for it being so high up in the tree. From that high it looked big enough to be a nice meal for Ducky that she could take in one bite. But when it was falling down Ducky saw how it grown into being the size of her if she was curled up like a ball.

In shock of what was happening Ducky actually opened her mouth some more of surprise instead of closing before it was too late. This resulted in that the fruit got itself into her mouth, and a part of it into her throat. Ducky could also feel that she didn’t have much air in her lungs. She had to clear her throat quickly. There was two ways for her to do it. She could either try to cough it up, or try to swallow the fruit whole.

Which way would it be?
1253112.title: Try to get it yourself.

12531122.content:
Feeling that she didn’t have much air left and that more then half of the fruit already was swallowed, Ducky decided that she should try to finish her meal.

She used her throat muscles to her limits, and she was heaving her body as a way to make the fruit go down. But no matter her hard tries she still felt how the fruit hadn´t moved any further down. She was really starting to panic now because it was only a matter of seconds before she would have no air left. Ducky wished that she had longer arms now so she could push the fruit down easier.

In a quick think Ducky saw a branch that stood out low on the tree. It was in the right level of Ducky’s head, and it seemed strong enough to take some force. Ducky´s plan was to run towards the branch, and (with the help of it) press the fruit down into her stomach. She only got one chance on making it right, or she would suffocate.

Will her plan work?
12531122.title: Swallow

125311221.content:
Ducky made a run for it, and luckily for her the branch was strong enough.

(Because she was in such a need of air the following things went by very fast.)

As soon as the fruit was starting to go down, Ducky once again used all the strength in her throat muscles not only for the fruit but also to finally get some air. Because she ran into the branch so quickly the force made the fruit go down in just a couple of seconds. Actually the last couple of seconds that Ducky could have hold her breath before she would have died.

As soon as the fruit went pass the part of her throat were the entrances to her lungs where Ducky could feel two kinds of sensations. One of how good it felt finally being able to take a deep breath of fresh air into her little lungs, and one of the somewhat painful but really wonderful feeling of being stuffed beyond belief.

As soon as Ducky felt her throat getting cleared of the fruit she finally got a chance to bow down her head to get some air. (She had been forced to stand with her neck and head straight up because of the fruit in her throat.) When she had her head down she saw how her and felt how the fruit was entering her stomach. Being that it was almost the same size as her made Ducky´s stomach grow out a lot to be able to keep the fruit inside of her. But it wasn’t the front of her belly that was expanding. The fruit´s round size made Ducky´s sides to grow out, making her feet stand far apart from each other. She stood now in a pose that made her look like she was going to start a sumo match. Ducky could even feel her backside getting bloated out and rounded. Her whole shape had become the one of the fruit.

In this shape Ducky could barley stand up or walk (or waddle to be more right). So after some unbalanced steps of this ball formed dinosaur, Ducky lost balance and fell into some bushes. Being completely exhausted after all that had happened, Ducky felt asleep in the bush.

After sleeping for an unknowingly long time Ducky woke up because someone had found her.

Who was it?
125311221.title: Yes.

choices: Duck continues to gain weight over night
Spike starts to gain weight after dinner
1253112211.content: Spike was walking down the same path as ducky when he got hungry he decided to eat the bush where Ducky had fallen asleep in he went to take a bit and he saw her laying there her belly still full of the fruit he licked her and caused her to giggle, Spike stop it I am ok I am I am hehe, she tried to get up but the weight of the fruit was to much for her so Spike grabbed her tail and pulled her out of the bush and she grabbed a low hanging branch and leaned against the tree she rubbed her belly and sighed I wish I hadn't eaten that fruit no no no Spike groaned to show his concern for her. I will be ok Spike I will I will she soon drifted off to sleep again and Spike ate his fill of the bush and fell asleep beside her. Ducky woke up and stuggled to stand but she did Spike was also getting up. Ducky said come on Spike let us go home momma will be worried about us she climbed up on to Spike's neck he (groaned in displeaser). What? Ducky asked do I feel heaver? (Spike grunted) Ducky thought I can't have gained that much weight just from one fruit can I? What happens next?

Ducky looks at spikes belly and gasp it is now 10 times bigger than she is she waddels over and Pat's his belly and says don't worry spike you did not hurt me very much she rubs her back in slight pain and says I am sure our friends will be able to help us loss this weight you more than me she giggles to herself spike stares at his sister and pokes her belly with his foot. She pokes his belly and says I know but I needed to gain some weight you always eat my food anyway but I am not mad no no no she hugs spike around his neck and goes to gather breakfast for herself and spike.

141.content:
chomper was getting hungry again, he felt like having something bigger to eat than usual. But one thing stopped him, his friends. if he ate larger meals one day he might eat them, and that was something he did not like the sound of.

finally chomper decided to...
141.title: Chomper's hunger

1412.content: Chomper decided to find something bigger to eat as he was a sharp-tooth and he would become a very big one some day. As he walked around he suddenly spotted a massive dinosaur on the ground dead. It appeared to have died of old age, since it didn't have any indication of being wounded and that meant the meat was up for grabs. Chomped decided to...
1412.title: Lucky Break

choices: Chomper wakes up sometime later to get a BIG surprise.
14121.content: Starting from the feet and going up. He munched, chomped, gulped and repeated over and over again. All the while all the food went straight into his ever expanding paunch. He soon felt full after eating the first leg, but he was getting such a rush from eating such a big meal alone he kept on eating. He ate and ate and ate like it was his last meal. He felt his limits coming in to stop him from eatting, but he knew that the more he ate the bigger of an appetite he'd have from then on. Only till he got the last scrap of meat off the dinosaur did he finally fall flat on his back. His stomach stetched out a good 10 feet. It was hard to breath and his stomach hurt badly, but he felt a sense of victory. A feeling of fatigue kicked in and he slowly kicked in. At that time his metabolism kicked in.
14121.title: I can't believe he ate it all.

141211.content:
Chomper smacked his lips and cuddled his gigantic belly, he wouldn't be moving any time soon...and his eye lids felt much heavier than before...a nap...that sounds nice...

A few blinks later and Chomper looked around, he was in the Great Valley, "Huh?" he looked down at his belly, it was back to normal! HE was back to normal, regular, tiny Chomper.

"Hey Chomper!" He heard a voice...Littlefoot? "It's time to play a game, it is, it is!" Ducky? "C'mon, we don't have all day!" Cera grunted... Chomper looked around for his friends, he could hear their voices, but where were they...he blinked again, and as if they'd always been there, suddenly his friends stood before him.

Chomper shook his head, they were his friends, smiling down at him, but...they were FAT! Fat was the nice way of saying it, he'd never seen any creature with so much pure girth slapped onto their frames. Littlefoot, Ducky, Cera, Spike, Petrey all looked down over the fattest cheeks possible at little Chomper. "C'mon Chomper, we're going to go play!" Littlefoot spoke through several chins, his voice deeper somehow.

Chomper looked at the bloated and somehow mobile blobs before him. "I...oh no..." and with that, his stomach growled as he examined his...friends...not meals...right? But...he could feel drool begin to dribble down his chin as he watched his engorged playmates move, begging for a bite...
141211.title: Chomper has a dream.

choices: Go cover other dinosaurs in his stinkyness.
141212.content: After a while, the little sharptooth woke up. Chomper looked at his massively swollen belly when he felt a rumble. "What's that?" he asked to himself. Suddenly his rear end began shaking. "Oh boy," he said, when his anal cheeks let out a big PPPHHHBBBTTT! A very stinky odor caused by all the meat he just ate rushed out and killed some of the nearby plants. In fact, even a little swimmer walking by passed out. "Oh boy," said Chomper,"another little snack." Chomper learned that his "stinky gas" could be used as a weapon to get food. He thought about what to do next: get another meal, or go back to his friends.
141212.title: The Fart of a Sharptooth

1412122.content: Chomper setted off to find them. So he found them at the Dinosaur Protecton Force (DPF) train hanger looking cross. Michael the dino ranger (who lived in the valley with his friends Zachary And Ben) was red in the face. WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN? Before chomper could answer, his stinky gas acted up and he flew into the air like a rocket. OH MY GOD!!! Cried Michael! Just then Chomper's farts stopped and he fell at high speed toward the ground, lucky a 0-4-0 tender switcher was shunting a flatbed loaded with a-lot of mattresses. Will chomper land on them or smash his skull on the ground?

1432.title: Cera

14321.content:
How about this, to have it make a little sense.

One day Chomper is going on and on about how great meat is, and how much better it is to be a carnivore. Cera is there, and she doesn't see what's so appealing about it, so Chomper tells her she'd understand if she just tried it.
This gets her curious, so she takes him up on his offer and eats something living, and she finds that, to her surprise, she loves it! And she gets hooked, eating more and more other dinos, unable to stop herself, even if it means swallowing up all her friends.
14321.title: Newly encouraged omnivore

info.description:
The Land Before Time gives us several characters to have fun with, in our own little ways. Do as you wish to the little dinos, make this a "sequel" to be remembered.

Inflation, weight gain, muscle, slob, vore, blueberrying, it is all encouraged. Just try to keep things as in character and within the general time period of the movies as possible with a story like this.

Adult stuff isn't necessary, but it's not discouraged. Do try to keep it on the subject of some form of growth.
